keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating over 4,000 jobs to Lewisham alone, with jobs in public transport, care for the elderly, housebuilding and green industries.
Free insulation in each household which could save around £150 a year in fuel bills.
Push for a 'Living Wage' – a policy to ensure low income workers can earn enough to provide for themselves and their families.
Support pensioners in their demand for a guaranteed non-means tested weekly pension of £170.
Ensure local NHS services are easy to access and will oppose cuts, closures and sell-offs.

issues.economy: The Green Party's million-jobs recovery plan would bring over 4,000 jobs to Lewisham alone. These jobs would be in public transport, care for the elderly, housebuilding and green industries.
issues.health: Darren will make sure your local NHS services are easy to access and will oppose cuts, closures and sell-offs.
issues.socialWelfare: Darren will push for a 'Living Wage' – a policy to ensure low income workers can earn enough to provide for themselves and their families.

housing.content: Darren will push for free insulation in every home.

images.caption: Green Party leaflet featuring candidate Darren and messaging for the Lewisham Deptford constituency.
